Package org.easybatch.flatfile

This package contains flat file processing support classes.

See: Description

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    DelimitedRecordMapper<T>
    DSV to Object mapper implementation.
    DelimitedRecordMarshaller
    Marshals a POJO to CSV format.
    FixedLengthRecordMapper<T>
    Fixed Length Record to Object mapper implementation.
    FixedLengthRecordMarshaller
    Marshals a POJO to fixed length format.
    FlatFileMultiRecordReader
    Reads a chunk of records at a time.
    FlatFileRecordReader
    A RecordReader implementation that read data from a flat file.

Package org.easybatch.flatfile Description

This package contains flat file processing support classes.
